parameters.name: ExplodeDirection
parameters.description: Explode direction entity (e.g., IEdge , IFace2 , IRefAxis )

parameters.name: ExplDirIndex
parameters.description: Explode direction manipulator index as defined in swExplodeDirectionIndex_e

title: IPartExplodeStep.SetExplodeDirection
description: Sets the explode direction (manipulator index and entity) for this explode step.
signature:
void SetExplodeDirection( 
   System.Object
ExplodeDirection
,
   System.Int32
ExplDirIndex
)

parameters.name: ExplodeDirection
parameters.description: Explode direction entity (e.g., IEdge , IFace2 , IRefAxis )

parameters.name: ExplDirIndex
parameters.description: Explode direction manipulator index as defined in swExplodeDirectionIndex_e
